text: Allahara nama niye (arambha karachi), (yini) rahamana (--parama karunamaya, yini asima karuna o daya basatah bisbajagatera samasta srstira sahabasthanera prayojaniya saba byabastha agrima kare rekhechena), (yini) rahima (--aphuranta phaladata, yamra apara karuna o dayara phale pratyekera ksudratama subha-pracesta'o bipulabhabe saphalyamandita o puraskrta haye thake).
